headline: The Eyes of Mary
description: A vivid doodlerama blending sacred imagery with chaotic, colorful abstraction — invoking Mary’s gaze amid fire, serpentine shapes, and baptismal echoes.
author: Aleksandr
whyItMatters: This piece demonstrates the Trickster Prophet phase — warning through play, blending parody and prophecy, chaos and sacred symbol. It shows how humor, irreverence, and wild color can still channel devotion and vision.

associatedMedia.description: Colorful doodle featuring eyes, serpentine shapes, fire, and religious overtones.
